item.title: Birkin bag prices are sinking at auction despite high-profile sales
item.description: Luxury experts say aspirational luxury consumers are facing new pressures from inflation and a slowing job market, meaning fewer Birkin buyers at auct...

item.title: Art Basel Miami sees strong attendance and sales as art market recovers
item.description: More than 80,000 collectors and art fans poured into Art Basel Miami Beach, with several works selling for over $1 million.

item.title: Inside Art Basel Miami 2025
item.description: Robert Frank gets an inside look at Art Basel Miami and speaks exclusively with Art Basel CEO Noah Horowitz, UBS Head of Art Advisory Americas Matthew...

item.title: Walmart's First Family: The numbers behind the wealth
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank breaks down the massive wealth of the Walton family, the heirs behind the Walmart fortune.

item.title: Rising stocks and IPOs helped create 287 new billionaires this year
item.description: The U.S. led the global billionaire increase, with 92 new self-made billionaires representing wealth of $180 billion, according to UBS.
